ResearchProjectDef.label: psychoid brewing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Prepare psychoid leaves into a mildly euphoria-inducing and addictive tea at the campfire or cooking stove.

ResearchProjectDef.label: tree sowing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Sow the local biome's natural trees in your fields.

ResearchProjectDef.label: beer brewing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build a brewery and fermenting vats to transform hops into tasty, tasty beer.

ResearchProjectDef.label: complex furniture
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build complex furniture like beds, end tables, dining chairs, armchairs, dressers, tool cabinets, billiard tables, and poker tables, vents, sarcophagi, and more.

ResearchProjectDef.label: passive cooler
ResearchProjectDef.description: Make passive coolers, to cool indoor spaces without using electricity.

ResearchProjectDef.label: stonecutting
ResearchProjectDef.description: Cut rock chunks into stone blocks for use in construction. Build beautiful stone tile floors or ugly concrete walkways.

ResearchProjectDef.label: complex clothing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Tailor complicated garments like pants, dusters, and cowboy hats.

ResearchProjectDef.label: drug production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build a drug lab for basic drug synthesis. Further research is required to make specific drugs.

ResearchProjectDef.label: cocoa
ResearchProjectDef.description: Sow cocoa trees to create your own delicious chocolate. Eating chocolate fulfills the need for recreation, and it's valuable on the market too.

ResearchProjectDef.label: devilstrand
ResearchProjectDef.description: Plant devilstrand, a slow-growing mushroom that yields an exceptionally tough, heat-resistant plant fiber.

ResearchProjectDef.label: carpet making
ResearchProjectDef.description: Weave beautiful carpets from cloth.

ResearchProjectDef.label: pemmican
ResearchProjectDef.description: Make pemmican, a preserved mixture of meat and plant matter that doesn't go bad for a long time. Great for traveling.

ResearchProjectDef.label: smithing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build smithies for crafting metal weapons like knives, gladii, and maces. Work metal into clean, beautiful floor tiles.

ResearchProjectDef.label: recurve bow
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build the recurve bow, an effective and inexpensive ranged weapon.

ResearchProjectDef.label: psychite refining
ResearchProjectDef.description: Refine psychoid leaves into flake and yayo, different forms of the euphoric psychite drug.

ResearchProjectDef.label: wake-up production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Synthesize wake-up, a work performance-enhancing drug which replaces the need for sleep.

ResearchProjectDef.label: go-juice production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce go-juice, a synthetic combat-performance-enhancing drug which improves shooting, melee, and movement ability, and dulls pain.

ResearchProjectDef.label: penoxycyline production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce penoxycline, a disease prevention drug which blocks plague, malaria, and more before they start.

ResearchProjectDef.label: long blades
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft longswords and spears.

ResearchProjectDef.label: plate armor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Smith suits of plate armor from metal or wood. This heavy armor noticeably slows movement, but protects very effectively.

ResearchProjectDef.label: greatbow
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft greatbows for killing enemies at great range.
